resources.string: This app will send your information and Image/Video to nearest police station. Police will be there as soon as possible. We Do not have any responsibility for the content you upload. So Please be specific and accurate.

The objective of this app is to help people. By using this app you can stop child labour, corruption , voilence near you and you can also stop people from spreading filth in your area by just taking the picture. This app totally depends on you. If nobody is listening your complain then you can also shout on facebook using this app and send it to various News channels/papers. If we are able to reduce even slight percent of the problems of our country then it will be honour for us. India not a developed country hence we donot have enough resources to solve/stop all these problems but we are on second position in population all over the world . So if we help each other then we can solve the problems of each other and our country too.

This app will send your information and Image/Video to Police station/news .Police and media will take action as soon as possible. We Do not have any responsibility for the content you upload. So Please be specific and accurate.

This app will send your information and Image/Video to Nearest NGO .NGOs will help the child as soon as possible. We Do not have any responsibility for the content you upload. So Please be specific and accurate.

This app will send your information and Image/Video to Nagar Nigam . Nagar Nigam will take action as soon as possible. We Do not have any responsibility for the content you upload. So Please be specific and accurate.
